# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-105">合规性中心中的数据丢失防护 (DLP) 包括许多可供您在 DLP 策略中使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-106">本主题列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并显示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-108">此外，关键字和校验和等确凿的证据可用于识别敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-110">ABA 传送号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-111">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-112">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-112">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-113">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-114">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-115">以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-115">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-116">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-116">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-117">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-117">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-118">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-118">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-119">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-119">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-120">未格式化：以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-120">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-121">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-122">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-123">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-124">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-125">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-126">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-146">阿根廷国家标识 (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-147">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-148">八个数字，用点分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-148">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-149">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-150">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-151">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-151">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-152">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-152">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-153">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-153">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-154">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-154">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-155">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-155">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-156">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-157">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-158">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-159">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-160">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-160">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-161">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-173">澳大利亚银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-174">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-175">具有或不具有银行状态分支号码的6到 twn 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-175">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-176">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-177">帐号是6到10位数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-177">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-178">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-179">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-179">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-180">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-180">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-181">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-181">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-182">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-183">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-184">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-185">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-186">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-187">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-188">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-189">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-190">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-191">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-207">澳大利亚商业电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-207">Australia business number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-208">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-209">11个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-209">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-210">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-211">11个带可选分隔符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-211">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-212">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-212">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-213">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-213">an option hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-214">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-214">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-215">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-215">an option hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-216">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-216">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-217">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-217">an option hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-218">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-218">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-219">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-220">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-220">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-221">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-222">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-222">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-223">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-223">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-224">找到 Keywords_australian_business_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-224">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-225">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-225">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-226">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-226">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-236">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-236">Australia company number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-237">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-238">9个带分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-238">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-239">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-240">九位数带分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-240">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-241">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-241">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-242">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-242">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-243">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-243">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-244">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-244">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-245">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-245">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-246">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-247">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-248">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-250">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-250">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-251">找到 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-251">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-252">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-252">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-253">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-253">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-259">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-259">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-260">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-260">australian company no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-262">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-262">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-263">澳大利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-263">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-264">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-265">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-265">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-266">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-267">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-267">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-268">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-268">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-269">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-269">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-270">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-270">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-271">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-272">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-272">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-273">4到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-273">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-274">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-274">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-275">9个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-275">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-276">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-277">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-277">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-278">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-279">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-280">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-280">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-281">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-281">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-282">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-282">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-382">澳大利亚医疗帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-382">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-383">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-384">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-384">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-385">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-386">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-386">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-387">第一个数字在范围2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-387">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-388">第九个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-388">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-389">第十位数字是问题位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-389">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-390">第十位数字 (可选) 是单个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-390">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-391">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-392">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-392">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-393">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-394">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-394">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-395">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-395">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-396">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-396">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-397">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-397">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-409">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-409">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-410">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-411">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-411">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-412">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-413">一个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-413">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-414">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-414">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-415">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-415">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-416">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-416">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-417">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-417">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-418">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-418">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-419">找到 Keyword_passport 或 Keyword_australia_passport_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-419">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-453">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-453">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-454">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-455">8到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-455">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-456">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-457">通常显示空格的八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-457">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-458">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-458">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-459">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-459">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-460">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-460">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-461">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-461">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-462">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-462">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-463">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-464">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-464">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-465">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-466">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-466">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-467">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-467">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-468">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-468">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-469">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-469">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-471">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-471">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-472">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-472">australian business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-473">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-473">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-474">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-474">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-475">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-475">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-476">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-476">service veterans</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-477">withholding tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-477">withholding tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-478">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-478">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-479">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-479">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-480">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-480">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-481">奥地利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-481">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-482">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-482">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-484">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-484">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-485">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-486">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-486">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-487">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-487">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-488">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-488">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-489">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-489">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-490">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-491">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-491">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-492">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-492">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-498">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-498">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="austria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-509">奥地利国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-509">Austria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-510">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-510">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-511">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-511">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-512">字母、数字和特殊字符的24个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-512">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-513">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-513">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-514">24个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-514">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="0de42-515">22个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-515">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-516">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-516">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-517">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-518">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-518">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-519">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-520">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-520">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-521">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-521">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-522">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-522">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
<!-- EU austria_eu_national_id -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-523">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-523">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-524">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-524">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-525">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-525">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-526">
national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-526">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-527">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-527">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-528">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-528">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-529">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号码 sensitiveinformation 类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-529">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-530">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-531">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-531">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-532">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-533">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-533">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-534">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-534">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-535">一个空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-535">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-536">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-536">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-537">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-538">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-538">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-539">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-540">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-540">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-541">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-541">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-542">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-542">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-543">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-543">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-544">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-544">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-545">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-545">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-546">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-546">austrian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-547">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-547">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-548">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-548">reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-549">österreichisch reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-549">österreichisch reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-550">奥地利社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-550">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-551">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-551">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-552">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-553">以指定格式表示的10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-553">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-554">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-555">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-555">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-556">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-556">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-557">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-557">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-558">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-558">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-559">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-560">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-560">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-561">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-562">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-562">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-563">函数 "Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-563">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-564">_or_equivalent "找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-564">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-565">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-565">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-566">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-566">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-567">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-567">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-583">奥地利税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-583">Austria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-584">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-584">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax ID number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-585">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-586">9个数字，带可选连字符和正斜线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-586">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-587">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-588">9个带可选连字符和正斜线的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-588">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-589">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-589">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-590">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-590">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-591">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-591">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-592">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-592">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-593">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-593">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-594">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-595">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-595">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-596">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-597">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-597">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-598">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-598">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-599">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-599">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-600">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-601">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-601">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-624">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-624">Austria value added tax</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-625">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-626">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-626">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-627">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-628">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-628">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-629">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-629">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-630">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-630">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-631">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-631">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-632">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-632">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-633">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-633">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-634">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-634">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-635">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-635">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-636">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-636">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-637">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-637">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-638">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-638">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-639">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-639">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-640">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-640">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-641">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-641">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-642">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-642">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-643">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-643">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-644">找到 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-644">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-645">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-645">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-646">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-646">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-664">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-664">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-665">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-665">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-666">字符串 "DocumentDb"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-666">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-667">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-667">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-668">字符串 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-668">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-669">介于3-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-669">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-670">大于符号 ( # A0) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-670">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-671">86小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-671">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-672">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-672">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-673">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-674">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-674">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-675">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-676">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-676">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-677">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-677">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-678">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-678">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-693">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-693">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-694">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-695">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-695">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="0de42-696">com "或" cloudapp "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-696">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="0de42-697">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-697">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="0de42-698">net "和字符串" Password "或" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-698">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-699">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-699">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-700">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-700">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-701">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-701">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-702">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-702">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-703">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-703">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-704">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-704">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-705">字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-705">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="0de42-706">com "，" cloudapp。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-706">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="0de42-707">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-707">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="0de42-708">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-708">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-709">介于1-300 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-709">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-710">字符串 "Password"、"password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-710">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-711">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-711">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-712">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-712">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-713">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-713">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-714">一个或多个不是分号的字符 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-714">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-715">分号 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-715">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-716">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-717">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-717">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-718">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-719">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-719">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-720">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-720">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-721">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-721">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-748">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-748">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-749">字符串 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-749">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-750">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-750">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-751">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-751">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-752">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-752">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-753">43小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-753">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-754">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-754">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-775">Azure 发布设置密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-775">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-776">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-777">字符串 "userpwd ="，后跟一个字母数字字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-777">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-778">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-778">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-779">字符串 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-779">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-780">任何60小写字母或数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-780">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-781">引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-781">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-782">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-783">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-783">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-784">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-785">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-785">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-786">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-786">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-787">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-787">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-802">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-802">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-803">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-803">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-804">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-804">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="0de42-805">net "，后跟下面的模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-805">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-806">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-806">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-807">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-807">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="0de42-808">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-808">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-809">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-809">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-810">字符串 "password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-810">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-811">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-811">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-812">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-812">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-813">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-813">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-814">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-814">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-815">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-815">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-816">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-817">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-817">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-818">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-819">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-819">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-820">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-820">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-821">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-821">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-836">Azure SA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-836">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-838">字符串 "sig"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-838">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-839">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-839">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-840">字符串 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-840">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-841">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-841">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-842">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-842">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-843">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-843">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-844">介于43-53 个字符和小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-844">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-845">字符串 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-845">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-846">不是字母或数字的小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 的任意字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-846">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-847">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-847">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-848">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-848">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-849">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-849">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-850">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-850">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-851">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-851">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
