## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-891">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-891">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-892">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-893">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-893">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-894">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-894">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-895">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-895">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-896">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-896">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-897">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-897">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-898">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-898">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-899">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-899">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-900">字符串 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-900">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-901">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-902">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-903">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-904">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-904">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-905">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-905">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-906">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-907">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-907">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-908">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-909">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-910">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-910">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-911">正则表达式 **CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-911">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-912">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-912">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-930"> (通用) 的 Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-930">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-931">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-931">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-932">86的任意组合（以小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) ，在下面的模式中所列字符的前面或后面）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-932">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-933">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-933">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-934">0到大于号之一 ( # A0) 、撇号 ( ' ) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或数字标记 ( # ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-934">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-935">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-935">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-936">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-936">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-937">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-938">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-938">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-939">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-940">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-940">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-941">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-941">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-942">比利时驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-942">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-943">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-943">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-944">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-944">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-945">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-945">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-946">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-946">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-947">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-947">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-948">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-948">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-949">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-949">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-950">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-950">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-951">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-951">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-952">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-952">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-953">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-953">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-975">比利时国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-975">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-976">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-976">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-977">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-978">11 个数字加分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-978">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-979">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-980">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-980">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-981">6个数字和两个句点（以 YY 为格式）。月.DD 出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-981">six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-982">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-982">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-983">奇数的三个连续数字 (奇数，即使偶数) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-983">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-984">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-984">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-985">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-985">two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-986">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-987">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-987">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-988">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-989">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-990">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-990">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-991">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-991">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-992">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1051">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1051">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1052">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1052">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1054">两个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1054">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1055">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1056">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1056">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1057">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1057">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1058">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1058">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1059">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1059">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1060">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1061">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1061">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1062">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1062">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1072">比利时社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1072">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1073">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1073">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1074">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1074">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1075">11位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1075">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1076">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1076">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1077">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1077">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1078">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1079">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1079">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1080">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1081">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1081">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1082">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1082">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1083">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1083">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1084">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1085">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1085">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1105">比利时税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1105">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1106">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1106">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1107">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1108">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1108">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1109">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1110">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1110">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1111">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1111">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1112">"0" 或 "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1112">a "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1113">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1113">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1114">"0" 或 "1" 或 "2" 或 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1114">a "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1115">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1115">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1116">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1116">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1117">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1117">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1118">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1118">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1119">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1119">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1120">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1120">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1121">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1121">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1180">比利时增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1180">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1181">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1182">12个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1182">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1183">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1184">12个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1184">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1185">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1185">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1186">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1186">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1187">数字0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1187">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1188">一个从1到9的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1188">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1189">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1189">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1190">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1190">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1191">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1191">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1192">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1192">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1193">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1193">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1194">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1194">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1195">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1195">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1196">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1196">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1197">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1197">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1198">找到 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1198">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1199">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1199">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1200">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1200">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1212">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1212">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1213">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1214">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1214">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1215">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1215">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1216">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1216">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1217">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1217">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1218">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1218">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1219">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1219">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1220">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1220">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1221">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1221">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1222">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1222">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1223">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1223">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1224">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1224">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1225">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1225">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1226">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1227">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1227">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1228">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1229">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1229">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1230">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1230">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1231">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1231">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1232">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1232">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1233">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1233">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1234">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1234">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1235">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1235">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1247">巴西法人编号 (CNPJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1247">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1248">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1249">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1249">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1250">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1250">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1251">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1251">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1252">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1252">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1253">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1253">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1254">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1254">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1255">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1255">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1256">三个数字 (这些前八位数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1256">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1257">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1257">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1258">四位数的分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1258">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1259">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1259">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1260">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1260">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1261">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1262">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1263">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1264">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1265">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1265">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1266">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1266">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1267">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1267">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1268">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1268">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1269">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1269">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1270">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1270">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1283">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1283">CNPJ</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1284">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1284">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1285">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1285">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1292">巴西国家标识卡 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1292">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1293">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1294">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1294">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1295">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1295">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1296">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1297">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1297">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1298">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1298">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1299">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1299">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1300">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1300">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1301">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1301">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1302">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1302">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1303">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1303">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1304">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1304">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1305">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1305">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1306">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1306">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1307">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1307">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1308">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1308">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1309">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1310">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1310">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1311">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1312">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1312">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1313">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1313">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1314">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1314">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1315">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1315">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1316">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1316">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1317">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1317">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1318">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1318">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1319">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1319">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1320">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1320">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1321">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1321">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1322">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1322">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1323">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1323">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1324">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1324">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1325">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1325">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1326">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1326">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1327">RG（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1327">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1328">RIC（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1328">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1329">保加利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1329">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1330">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1330">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1332">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1332">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1333">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1334">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1334">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1335">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1336">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1336">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1337">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1338">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1338">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1339">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1339">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1340">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1340">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1359">保加利亚国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1359">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1360">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1360">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1361">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1362">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1362">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1363">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1363">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1364">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1364">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1365">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1365">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1366">与出生顺序对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1366">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1367">与性别对应的一位数字：男的偶数位和用于女的奇数位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1367">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1368">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1368">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1369">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1370">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1370">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1371">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1372">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1372">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1373">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1373">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1374">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1374">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1375">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1375">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1376">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1376">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1421">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1421">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1422">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1422">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1423">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1424">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1424">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1425">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1426">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1426">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1427">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1428">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1428">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1429">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1430">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1430">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1431">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1431">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1432">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1432">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1433">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1433">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1434">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1434">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1435">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1435">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1437">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1437">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1439">保加利亚纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1439">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1440">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1440">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1441">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1441">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1442">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1442">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1443">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1443">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1444">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1444">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1445">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1446">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1446">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1447">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1448">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1448">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1449">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1449">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1450">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1450">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1451">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1451">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1452">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1452">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1497">加拿大银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1497">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1498">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1499">七个或十二个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1499">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1500">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1501">加拿大银行帐号是七个或十二个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1501">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1502">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1502">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1503">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1503">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1504">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1504">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1505">三位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1505">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1506">零 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1506">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1507">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1507">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1508">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1508">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1509">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1509">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1510">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1510">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1511">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1511">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1512">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1512">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1513">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1513">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1514">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1514">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1515">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1515">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1516">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1516">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1517">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1517">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1541">加拿大驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1541">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1542">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1543">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1543">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1544">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1545">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1545">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1546">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1547">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1547">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1548">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1549">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1549">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1550">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1550">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1551">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1551">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1552">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1552">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1688">加拿大运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1688">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1689">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1690">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1690">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1691">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1692">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1692">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1693">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1694">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1694">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1695">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1696">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1696">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1697">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1697">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1698">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1698">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1710">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1710">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1711">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1711">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1712">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1712">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1713">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1713">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1714">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1714">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1715">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1716">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1717">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1718">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1718">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1719">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1719">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1720">找到 Keyword_canada_passport_number 或 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1720">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1750">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1750">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1751">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1752">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1752">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1753">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1754">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1754">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1755">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1756">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1756">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1757">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1758">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1758">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1759">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1759">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1760">找到 Keyword_canada_phin 或 Keyword_canada_provinces 中至少有两个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1760">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1793">加拿大社会保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1793">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1794">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1795">9个数字，带可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1795">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1796">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1797">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1797">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1798">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1798">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1799">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1799">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1800">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1800">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1801">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1801">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1802">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1802">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1803">未格式化：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1803">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1804">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1805">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1805">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1806">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1807">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1808">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1808">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1809">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1809">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1810">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1810">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1811">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1811">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1812">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1812">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1813">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1813">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1814">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1814">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1815">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1815">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1816">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1816">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1817">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1817">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_sin_collaborative"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1833">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1833">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1834">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1834">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1837">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1837">drivers licence</span></span>
