## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1842">智利标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1842">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1843">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1844">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个校验位或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1844">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1845">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1845">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1846">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1846">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1847">一到两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1847">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1848">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1848">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1849">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1849">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1850">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1850">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1851">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1851">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1852">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1852">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1853">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 这是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1853">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1854">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1855">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1856">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1857">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1857">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1858">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1858">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1859">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1859">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1860">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1860">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1861">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1861">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1862">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1862">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1863">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1863">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1869">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1869">Identification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1873">墨守成规</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1873">RUT</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1877">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1877">Identificación</span></span> 

   
## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1878">中国居民身份卡片 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1878">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1879">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1879">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1880">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1880">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1881">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1881">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1882">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1882">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1883">6个数字，这是一个地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1883">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1884">8位数，形式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1884">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1885">三个数字，这是一个订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1885">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1886">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1886">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1887">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1887">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1888">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1888">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1889">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1889">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1890">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1890">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1891">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1891">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1892">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1892">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1893">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1893">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1894">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1894">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1895">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1895">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1896">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1896">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1909">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1909">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1910">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1910">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1911">14到16个数字，可以设置格式或无格式 (dddddddddddddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1911">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1912">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1912">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1913">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1913">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1914">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1914">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1915">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1915">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-1916">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1916">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1917">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1917">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1918">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1918">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1919">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1919">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1920">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1920">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1921">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1921">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1922">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1922">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1923">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1923">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-1924">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1924">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1925">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1925">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-1926">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-1926">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2186">克罗地亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2186">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2187">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2187">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2188">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2189">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2189">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2190">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2191">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2191">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2192">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2193">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2193">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2194">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2195">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2195">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2196">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2196">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2197">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2197">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2213">克罗地亚 identity 卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2213">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2214">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2214">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2215">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2216">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2216">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2217">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2218">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2218">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2219">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2220">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2220">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2221">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2222">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2223">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2223">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2224">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2224">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2255">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2255">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2256">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2256">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2257">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2258">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2258">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2259">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2260">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2260">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2261">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2262">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2262">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2263">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2264">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2264">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2265">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2265">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2266">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2266">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2273">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2273">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2274">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2275">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2275">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2276">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2277">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2277">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2278">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2278">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2279">最后一个数字是用于国际数据交换目的的校验位，字母 HR 将加上11位数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2279">final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2280">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2280">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2281">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2281">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2282">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2282">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2283">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2283">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2284">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2284">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2285">找到 Keyword_croatia_oib_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2285">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2286">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2286">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2287">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2287">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2288">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2288">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2289">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2289">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2295">克罗地亚社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2295">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2296">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2296">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2297">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2297">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2298">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2298">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2299">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2299">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2300">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2300">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2301">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2301">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2302">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2302">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2303">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2303">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2304">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2304">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2305">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2305">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2306">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2306">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2307">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2307">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2308">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2308">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2309">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2309">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2310">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2310">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2327">克罗地亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2327">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2328">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税 Identificaiton 号码敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2328">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2330">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2330">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2331">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2332">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2332">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2333">10个数字，随机选择</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2333">ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2334">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2334">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2335">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2336">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2336">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2337">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2338">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2338">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2339">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2339">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2340">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2340">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2341">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2342">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2342">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2373">塞浦路斯驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2373">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2374">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2374">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2375">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2375">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2376">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2376">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2377">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2377">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2378">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2378">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2379">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2379">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2380">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2380">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2381">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2381">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2382">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2382">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2383">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2383">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2384">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2384">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2399">塞浦路斯国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2399">Cyprus national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2400">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2400">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2401">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2401">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2402">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2402">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2403">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2403">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2404">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2404">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2405">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2405">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2406">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2406">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2407">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2407">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2408">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2408">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2409">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2409">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2410">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2410">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2419">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2419">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2420">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2420">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2421">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2421">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2422">一个字母后跟6-8 个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2422">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2423">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2423">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2424">一个字母后跟6到8个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2424">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2425">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2425">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2426">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2426">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2427">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2427">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2428">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2428">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2429">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2429">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2430">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2430">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2431">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2431">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2432">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2432">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2433">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2433">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2435">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2435">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2437">塞浦路斯税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2437">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2438">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2439">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2440">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2440">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2441">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2442">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2442">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2443">一个 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2443">a "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2444">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2444">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2445">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2445">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2446">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2446">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2447">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2447">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2448">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2448">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2449">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2449">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2450">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2450">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2451">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2451">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2452">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2452">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2453">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2453">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2475">vergi kimlik kodu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2475">vergi kimlik kodu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2476">vergi kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2476">vergi kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2477">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2477">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2478">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2478">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2479">φορολογική ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2479">φορολογική ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2480">φορολογικού κωδικού</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2480">φορολογικού κωδικού</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2481">税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2481">tax number</span></span>


## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2482">捷克语驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2482">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2483">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2484">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2485">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2485">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2486">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2487">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2487">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2488">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2488">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2489">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2489">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2490">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2490">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2491">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2492">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2493">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2494">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2495">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2495">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2496">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2496">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2498">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2498">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2501">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2501">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2502">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2502">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2503">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2503">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2504">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2504">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2505">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2505">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2506">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2506">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2508">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2508">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2509">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2509">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2510">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2510">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2513">捷克语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2513">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2514">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2514">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2516">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2516">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2517">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2518">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2518">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2519">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2520">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2520">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2521">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2522">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2523">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2523">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2524">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2524">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2525">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2525">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2526">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2526">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2527">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2527">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2531">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2531">pas</span></span>


## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2532">捷克个人识别码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2532">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2533">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识号捆绑包中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2533">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2534">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2534">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2535">9个数字，带可选的正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，可选的正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2535">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2536">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2536">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2537"> (旧格式) 的9个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2537">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2538">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2538">nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2539">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2539">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2540">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2540">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2541">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2541">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2542">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2542">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2543">10个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2543">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2544">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2544">ten digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2545">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2545">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2546">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2546">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2547">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2547">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2548">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2548">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2549">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2550">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2551">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2552">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2553">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2553">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2554">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2554">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2555">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2556">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2556">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2557">捷克个人识别码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2557">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2558">Rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2558">Rodné číslo</span></span>


## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2559">捷克社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2559">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2560">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2560">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2562">指定模式中的10个数字和一个反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2562">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2563">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2564">10个数字和一个反斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2564">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2565">与出生日期对应的6个数字 (YYMMDD) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2565">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2566">反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2566">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2567">与一个序列号相对应的三个数字，用于分隔出生于同一日期的人员</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2567">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2568">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2568">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2569">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2570">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2570">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2571">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2572">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2572">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2573">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2573">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2574">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2574">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2575">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2575">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2576">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2576">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2592">捷克语税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2592">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2593">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2593">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2594">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2594">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2595">9个或10个数字，带可选反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2595">nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2596">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2596">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2597">9个或10个数字，可选 backslashl：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2597">nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2598">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2598">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2599">反斜杠 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2599">a backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2600">三个或四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2600">three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2601">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2602">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2602">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2603">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2604">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2604">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2605">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2605">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2606">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2606">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2645">丹麦驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2645">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2646">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2646">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2647">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2647">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2648">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2648">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2649">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2650">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2650">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2651">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2651">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2652">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2652">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2653">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2653">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2654">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2655">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2655">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2656">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2656">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2673">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2673">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2674">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2674">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2675">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2675">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2676">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2676">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2677">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2677">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2678">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2678">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2679">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2679">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2680">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2680">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2681">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2681">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2682">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2682">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2683">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2683">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2684">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2684">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2692">丹麦个人身份号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2692">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2693">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2693">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2694">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2695">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2695">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2696">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2697">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2697">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2698">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2698">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2699">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2699">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2700">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2700">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2701">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2702">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2702">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2703">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2704">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2705">正则表达式 Regex_denmark_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2705">The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2706">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2706">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2707">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2707">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2759">丹麦社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2759">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2760">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2760">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2761">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2762">指定模式中的10个数字和一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2762">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2763">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2764">10个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2764">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2765">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2765">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2766">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2766">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2767">与序列号对应的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2767">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2768">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2769">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2769">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2770">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2771">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2771">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2772">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2772">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2773">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2773">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2774">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2774">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2775">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2775">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2777">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2777">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2783">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2783">ssn</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2789">丹麦税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2789">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2790">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2790">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2791">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2792">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2792">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2793">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2794">包含 hyphenl 的10个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2794">ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2795">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2795">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2796">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2796">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2797">与序列号相对应的四个数字，其中第一个数字对应于出生世纪，而最后一个数字对应于个人的性别 (对于男为奇数，甚至对于女性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2797">four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2798">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2799">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2799">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2800">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2801">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2801">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2802">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2802">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2803">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2803">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2804">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2804">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2805">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2805">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
