## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2857">药品实施代理 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2857">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2858">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2859">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2859">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2860">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2861">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2861">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2862">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 这组可能的字母： abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是注册人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2862">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2863">一个字母 (不区分大小写) （注册人姓氏的第一个字母）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2863">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2864">七位数字，最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2864">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2865">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2866">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2867">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2868">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2868">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2869">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2869">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2870">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2870">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2871">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2871">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2872">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2872">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2873">爱沙尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2873">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2874">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2874">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2875">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2876">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2876">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2877">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2878">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2878">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2879">字母 "ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2879">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2880">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2880">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2881">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2881">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2882">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2882">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2883">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2883">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2884">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2884">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2885">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2885">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2886">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2886">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2888">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2888">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2892">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2892">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2893">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2893">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2894">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2894">drivers lic.</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2902">爱沙尼亚国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2902">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2903">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2903">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2904">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2905">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2905">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2906">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2907">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2907">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2908">一种数字，对应于性别和出生世纪 (奇数号码男，甚至是女号码，等等。1-2：19世纪;3-4：20世纪;5-6：21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2908">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2909">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2909">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2910">三个数字，对应于将出生在同一日期的人员组成的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2910">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2911">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2911">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2912">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2913">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2913">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2914">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2915">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2915">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2916">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2916">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2917">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2917">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2918">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2918">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2919">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2919">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2952">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2952">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2953">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2953">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2954">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2955">一个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2955">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2956">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2956">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2957">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2957">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2958">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2959">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2959">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2960">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2961">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2961">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2962">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2962">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2963">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2963">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2970">爱沙尼亚纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2970">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2971">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2971">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2972">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2972">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2973">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2973">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2974">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2974">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2975">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2975">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2976">一种与性别和世纪相对应的数字，其中奇数表示男，偶数表示女，如下所示：1，2代表19世纪;3，4表示20世纪;对于21世纪，为5，6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2976">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2977">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2977">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2978">三个数字，对应于将出生在同一日期的人员组成的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2978">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2979">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2979">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2980">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2981">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2981">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-2982">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2983">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2984">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2984">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2985">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2985">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-2986">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2986">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-2987">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-2987">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3020">EU 借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3020">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3021">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3022">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3022">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3023">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3024">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3024">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3025">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3026">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3026">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3027">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3028">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3028">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3029">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3029">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3030">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3030">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3031">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3031">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3032">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3032">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3033">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3033">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3034">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3034">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3035">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3035">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3036">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3036">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3482">芬兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3482">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3483">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3484">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3485">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3485">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3486">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3487">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3487">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3488">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3488">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3489">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3489">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3490">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3490">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3491">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3492">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3493">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3494">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3495">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3495">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3496">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3496">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3498">Keywords_finland_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3498">Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3499">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3499">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3501">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3501">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3502">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3502">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3503">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3503">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3504">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3504">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3505">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3505">drivers licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3507">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3507">driver's license number</span></span>

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3512">芬兰欧洲健康保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3512">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3513">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3514">20位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3514">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3515">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3516">20位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3516">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3517">10位数-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3517">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3518">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3518">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3519">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3519">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3520">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3521">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3522">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3523">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3523">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3524">正则表达式 Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3524">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3525">找到 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3525">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3527">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3527">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3543">芬兰国身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3543">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3544">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3544">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3545">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3545">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3546">6个数字加上一个字符，表示一个世纪加上三个数字加上校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3546">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3547">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3547">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3548">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3548">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3549">6位数，格式格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3549">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3550">世纪标记 (是 "-"、"+" 或 "a" ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3550">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3551">三位数的个人标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3551">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3552">不区分大小写的数字或字母 () 是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3552">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3553">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3554">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3554">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3555">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3556">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3556">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3557">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3557">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3558">找到 Keyword_finnish_national_id 中的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3558">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3559">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3559">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3608">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3608">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3609">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3609">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3610">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3610">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3611">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3611">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3612">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3612">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3613">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3613">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3614">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3614">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3615">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3615">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3616">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3617">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3617">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3618">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3619">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3619">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3620">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3620">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3621">找到 Keyword_finland_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3621">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3622">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3622">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3623">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3623">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3624">登记卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3624">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3625">Passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3625">Passi</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3626">芬兰社会保障号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3626">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3627">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3627">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3628">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3628">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3629">指定格式的11个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3629">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3630">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3630">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3631">指定格式的11个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3631">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3632">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3632">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3633">以下任一实例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3633">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3634">加号符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3634">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3635">负号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3635">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3636">字母 "A" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3636">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3637">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3637">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3638">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3638">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3639">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3639">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3640">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3640">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3641">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3641">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3642">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3642">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3643">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3643">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3644">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3644">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3645">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3645">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3646">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3646">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3670">芬兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3670">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3671">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3671">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3672">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3672">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3673">一个11字符组合的数字、字母、加号和减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3673">an 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3674">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3674">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3675">一个11个字符的数字、字母和加号和减号的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3675">an 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3676">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3676">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3677">以下之一：加号、减号或字母 "A" (不区分大小写) ，其中加号表示介于1800-1899 之间，负号意味着在1900-1999 之间出生，而 "A" 表示出生2000和之后</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3677">one of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3678">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3678">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3679">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3679">one letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3680">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3681">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3681">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3682">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3683">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3683">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3684">函数  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3684">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3685">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3685">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3686">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3686">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3687">函数  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3687">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3738">法国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3738">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3739">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3739">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3740">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3740">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3741">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3741">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3742">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3742">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3743">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3743">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3744">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3744">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3745">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3745">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3746">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3746">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3747">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3747">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3748">函数 Func_french_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3748">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3749">至少满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3749">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3750">找到 Keyword_french_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3750">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3751">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3751">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3754">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3754">drivers licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3756">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3756">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3757">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3757">driving license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3759">licence number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3759">licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3760">license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3760">license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3761">licence numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3761">licence numbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3762">license numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3762">license numbers</span></span>


## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3763">法国健康保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3763">France health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3765">21位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3765">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3766">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3767">21位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3767">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3768">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3768">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3769">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3769">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3770">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3770">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3771">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3771">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3772">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3772">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3773">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3774">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3775">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3776">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3776">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3777">正则表达式 Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3777">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3778">找到 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3778">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3779">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3779">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3780">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3780">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3781">保险卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3781">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3782">vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3782">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3783">d'assuré社交</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3783">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3784">法国国家标识卡片 (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3784">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3785">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3785">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3786">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3786">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3787">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3787">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3788">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3788">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3789">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3789">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3790">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3791">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3791">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3792">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3793">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3793">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3794">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3794">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3796">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3798">nationale d'idenite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3798">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3799">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3799">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3800">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3800">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3801">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3801">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3802">国家/地区标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3802">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3803">国家标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3803">national identity</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3805">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3805">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3806">numéro 的反 vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3806">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3807">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3807">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3808">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3808">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3809">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3810">9个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3810">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3811">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3812">9个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3812">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3813">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3813">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3814">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3814">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3815">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3815">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3816">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3817">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3817">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3818">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3819">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3819">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3820">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3820">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3821">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3821">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3828">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3828">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3829">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3829">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3830">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3830">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3831">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3831">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3832">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3832">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3833">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3833">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3834">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3834">パスポート ＃</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3840">PasseportNon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3840">PasseportNon</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3842">法国社会保障号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3842">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3843">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3843">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3844">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3845">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3845">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3846">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3847">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3847">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3848">13位数，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3848">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3849">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3849">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3850">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3850">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3851">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3852">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3852">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3853">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3854">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3854">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3855">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3855">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3856">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3856">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3857">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3857">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3858">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3858">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3859">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3859">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3860">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3860">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3861">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3861">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3887">法国纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3887">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3888">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3888">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3889">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3889">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3890">13位数的个人和九个数字的实体</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3890">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3891">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3891">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3892">适用于个人的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3892">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3893">一个数字，必须为0、1、2或3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3893">one digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3894">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3894">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3895">9个图元数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3895">nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3896">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3896">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3897">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3897">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3898">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3898">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3899">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3899">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3900">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3900">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3901">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3901">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3902">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3902">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3903">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3903">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3923">法国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3923">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3924">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3925">13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3925">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3926">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3926">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3927">13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3927">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3928">两个字母-FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3928">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3929">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3929">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3930">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3930">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3931">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3931">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3932">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3932">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3933">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3933">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3934">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3934">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3935">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3935">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3936">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3936">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3937">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3938">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3938">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3939">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3940">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3940">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3941">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3941">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3942">找到 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3942">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3943">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3944">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3944">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3945">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3945">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3946">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3946">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3947">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3947">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3948">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3948">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3949">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3949">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3950">增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3950">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3951">siren 标识无 numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3951">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3952">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3952">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3953">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3953">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3954">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3954">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3955">numéro de tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3955">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3956">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3956">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3957">德国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3957">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3958">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3958">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3959">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3959">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3960">11个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3960">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3961">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3961">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3962">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3962">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3963">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3963">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3964">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3964">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3965">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3965">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3966">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3966">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3967">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3967">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3968">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3969">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3969">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-3970">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-3971">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3971">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3972">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3972">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3973">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3973">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3974">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3974">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3975">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3975">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3976">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3976">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-3977">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-3977">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
