## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4070">德国身份卡片编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4070">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4071">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4071">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4072">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4072">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4073">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4074">自2010年11月1日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4074">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4075">从1年4月1987至31年10月2010：10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4075">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4076">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4076">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4077">自2010年11月1日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4077">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4078">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4078">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4079">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4079">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4080">介于1年4月1987至 31 10 月2010：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4080">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4081">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4081">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4082">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4082">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4083">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4083">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4084">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4084">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4085">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4085">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4086">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4086">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4087">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4087">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4088">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4088">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4089">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4089">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4090">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4090">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4091">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4091">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4092">id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4092">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4093">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4093">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4094">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4094">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4095">identity 卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4095">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4096">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4096">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4097">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4097">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4098">个人 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4098">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4099">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4099">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4100">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4100">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4101">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4101">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4102">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4102">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4103">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4103">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4104">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4104">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4105">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4105">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4106">10个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4106">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4107">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4107">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4108">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4108">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4109">第一个字符是数字或从该集合中的字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4109">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4110">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4110">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4111">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4111">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4112">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4112">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4113">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4114">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4115">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4116">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4116">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4117">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4117">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4118">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4118">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4119">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4119">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4120">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4120">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4121">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4121">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4122">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4122">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4123">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4123">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4132">geburtsdatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4132">geburtsdatum</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4135">Keyword_german_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4135">Keyword_german_passport_number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4136">Reisepass Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4136">No-Reisepass Nr-Reisepass</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport1"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4137">Keyword_german_passport1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4137">Keyword_german_passport1</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4138">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4138">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4140">bnationalit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4140">bnationalit.t</span></span>


## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4141">德国税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4141">Germany tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4142">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4142">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4143">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4144">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4144">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4145">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4146">11位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4146">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4147">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4147">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4148">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4148">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4149">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4150">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4150">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4151">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4152">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4152">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4153">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4153">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4154">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4154">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4155">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4155">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4156">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4156">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4158">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4158">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4182">德国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4182">Germany value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4184">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4184">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4186">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4186">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4187">字母 D 或 D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4187">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4188">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4188">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4189">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4189">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4190">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4190">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4191">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4191">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4192">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4192">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4193">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4193">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4194">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4194">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4195">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4196">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4197">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4199">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4199">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4200">找到 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4200">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4201">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4201">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4202">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4202">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4203">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4203">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4204">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4204">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4205">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4205">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4206">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4206">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4207">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4207">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4208">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4208">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4209">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4209">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4210">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4210">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4211">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4211">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4212">希腊驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4212">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4213">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4213">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4214">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4215">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4215">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4216">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4217">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4217">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4218">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4219">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4219">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4220">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4221">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4221">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4222">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4222">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4223">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4223">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4240">希腊国家 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4240">Greece national ID card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4241">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4241">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4242">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4242">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4243">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4243">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4244">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4244">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4245">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4245">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4246">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4246">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4247">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4247">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4248">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4248">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4249">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4249">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4250">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4250">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4251">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4251">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4252">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4252">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4253">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4254">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4254">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4255">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4256">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4256">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4257">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4257">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4258">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4258">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Greece National ID Card -->
<Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4259">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4259">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4260">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4260">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4261">希腊语 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4261">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4262">希腊国家 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4262">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4263">希腊语个人 id 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4263">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4264">希腊警察 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4264">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4265">identity 卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4265">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4266">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4266">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4267">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4267">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4268">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4268">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4269">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4269">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4270">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4270">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4271">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4272">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4272">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4273">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4274">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4274">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4275">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4276">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4276">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4277">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4278">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4278">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4279">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4279">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4280">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4280">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4287">希腊税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4287">Greece tax identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4288">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4288">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4289">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4290">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4290">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4291">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4292">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4292">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4293">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4294">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4294">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4295">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4296">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4296">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4297">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4297">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4298">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4298">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4327">香港 HKID) 号码的香港身份卡片 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4327">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4328">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4329">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4329">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4330">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4331">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4331">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4332">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4332">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4333">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4333">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4334">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4334">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4335">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4336">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4337">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4338">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4338">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4339">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4339">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4340">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4340">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4341">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4341">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4342">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4342">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4343">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4343">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4344">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4344">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4384">匈牙利驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4384">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4385">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4385">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4386">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4387">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4387">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4388">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4389">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4389">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4390">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4390">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4391">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4391">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4392">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4393">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4393">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4394">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4395">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4395">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4396">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4396">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4397">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4397">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4413">匈牙利国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4413">Hungary national identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4414">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4414">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4415">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4416">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4416">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4417">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4418">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4418">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4419">一种与性别相对应的数字 (1-男、2-女、其他号码也可能适用于在具有双公民的1900或公民之前出生的公民) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4419">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4420">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4420">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4421">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4421">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4422">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4422">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4423">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4424">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4424">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4425">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4426">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4426">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4427">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4427">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4428">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4428">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4429">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4429">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4430">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4430">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4441">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4441">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4442">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4442">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4443">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4444">两个字母后跟6个或7个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4444">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4445">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4446">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4446">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4447">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4448">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4448">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4449">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4450">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4451">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4451">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4452">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4452">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4453">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4453">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4454">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4454">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4455">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4455">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4459">匈牙利社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4459">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4460">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4460">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4461">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4462">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4462">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4463">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4464">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4464">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4465">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4466">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4466">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4467">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4468">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4468">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4469">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4469">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4470">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4470">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4471">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4471">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4472">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4472">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4492">匈牙利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4492">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4493">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4493">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4494">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4495">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4495">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4496">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4497">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4497">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4498">一个必须为 "8" 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4498">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4499">与日期01/01/1867 之间的天数对应的五个数字和个人的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4499">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4500">三个数字，对应于通过机会区分在同一天的人所生成的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4500">Three digits that correspond to the number generated by chance to differentiate individuals born on the same day</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4501">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4501">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4502">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4503">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4503">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4504">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4505">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4505">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4506">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4506">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4507">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4507">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4508">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4508">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4509">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4509">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4535">匈牙利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4535">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4536">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4537">10个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4537">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4538">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4539">10个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4539">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4540">2个字母-HU 或 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4540">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4541">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4541">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4542">8位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4542">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4543">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4543">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4544">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4544">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4545">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4545">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4546">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4546">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4547">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4547">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4548">找到 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4548">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4549">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4549">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4550">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4550">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4564"> (PAN) 的印度永久帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4564">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4565">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4566">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4566">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4567">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4568">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4568">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4569">五个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4569">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4570">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4570">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4571">一个字母，是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4571">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4572">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4572">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4573">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4573">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4574">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4574">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4575">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4575">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4576">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4576">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4577">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4577">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4578">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4578">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4580">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4580">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4581">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4581">Permanent Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4583">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4583">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4584">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4584">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4585">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4585">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4586">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4586">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4587">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4587">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4588">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4588">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4589">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4589">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4590">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4590">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4591">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4591">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4592">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4592">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4593">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4593">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4594">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4594">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4595">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4595">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4596">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4596">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4597">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4597">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4598">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4598">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4599">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4599">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4600">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4601">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4601">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4602">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4602">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4604">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4604">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4605">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4605">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4606">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4606">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4607">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4607">UID</span></span>
