## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4609">印度尼西亚身份卡片 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4609">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4610">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4611">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4611">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4612">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4613">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4613">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4614">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4614">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4615">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4615">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4616">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4616">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4617">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4617">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4618">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4618">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4619">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4619">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4620">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4620">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4621">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4621">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4622">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4622">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4623">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4623">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4624">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4624">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4625">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4625">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4626">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4626">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4627">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4627">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4628">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4628">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4629">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4629">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4630">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4630">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4631">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4631">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4632">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4632">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4633"> (IBAN) 的国际银行帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4633">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4634">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4635">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4635">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4636">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4637">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4637">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4638">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4638">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4639">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4639">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4640">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4640">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4641">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4641">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-p131">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-p131">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4644">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4644">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4645">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4646">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4646">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4647">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4648">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4648">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4649">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4649">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4650">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4650">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4651">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4651">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4652">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4652">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4653">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-10-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4653">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4654">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4655">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4655">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4656">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4657">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4657">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4658">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4659">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4659">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4660">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4661">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4661">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4662">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4662">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4663">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4663">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4664">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4664">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4665">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4665">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4666">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4666">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4667">Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4667">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4668">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4668">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4669">Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4669">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4670">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4670">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4671">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-9-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4671">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4672">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4672">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4673">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4673">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4674">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4674">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4675">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4675">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4676">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4676">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4677">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4677">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4678">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4678">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4679">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4679">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4680">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4680">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4681">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4681">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4682">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4682">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4683">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4683">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4684">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4684">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4685">Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4685">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4686">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4686">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4687">Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4687">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4688">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4688">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4689">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4689">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4690">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4690">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4691">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4691">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4692">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4692">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4693">Ipv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4693">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4694"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4694">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4695">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4695">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4696">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4697">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4698">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4699">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4699">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4700">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4700">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4701">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4701">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4702">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4702">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4703">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4703">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4704">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4704">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4705">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4705">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4706">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4706">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4707">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4707">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4710">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4710">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4715">爱尔兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4715">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4716">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4716">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4717">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4717">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4718">6位数，后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4718">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4719">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4719">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4720">6位数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4720">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4721">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4721">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4722">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4722">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4723">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4724">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4724">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4725">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4726">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4727">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4727">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4728">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4728">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4744">爱尔兰国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4744">Ireland national identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4745">此敏感信息类型实体仅包含在欧盟国家/地区标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4745">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4746">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4747">指定模式中的字母、数字和空格的九个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4747">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4748">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4749">指定模式中的字母、数字和空格的九个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4749">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4750">从01年1月2013到现在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4750">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4751">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4751">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4752">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4752">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4753">一个空格或大写的字母 "W" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4753">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4754">在01月1日之前1月2013：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4754">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4755">七个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4755">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4756">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4756">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4757">一个空格或大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4757">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4758">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4759">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4759">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4760">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4761">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4762">函数找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4762">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4763">找到了中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4763">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4764">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4765">函数找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4765">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4781">公共服务编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4781">public service no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4782">publicserviceno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4782">publicserviceno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4786">rsi 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4786">rsi number</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4794">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4794">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4795">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4795">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4796">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4797">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4797">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4798">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4799">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4799">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4800">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4800">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4801">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4801">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4802">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4803">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4803">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4804">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4805">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4805">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4806">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4806">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4807">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4807">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4809">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4809">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4810">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4810">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4811">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4811">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4812">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4812">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4816">passeport numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4816">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4817">爱尔兰个人公开服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4817">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4818">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4819">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4819">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4820">七位数字后跟1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4820">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4821">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4821">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4822">七位数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4822">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4823">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4823">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4824">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4824">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4825">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4825">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4826">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4826">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4827">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4827">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4828">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4828">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4829">字母 (区分大小写) 这是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4829">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4830">字母 "A" 或 "H" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4830">the letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4831">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4831">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4832">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4832">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4833">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4833">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4834">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4834">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4835">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4835">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4836">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4836">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4837">找到 Keyword_ireland_pps 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4837">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4838">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4838">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4839">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4839">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4840">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4840">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4841">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4841">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4842">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_ireland_pps"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4844">Keyword_ireland_pps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4844">Keyword_ireland_pps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4848">PPS No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4848">PPS No.</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4857">爱尔兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4857">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4858">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4858">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4859">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4860">七位数字后跟一个不带空格或分隔符的字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4860">seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4861">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4862">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4862">seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4863">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4863">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4864">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4864">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4865">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4866">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4866">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4867">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4868">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4868">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4869">函数  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4869">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4870">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4870">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4871">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4871">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4872">函数  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4872">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4887">ppsno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4887">ppsno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4888">公共服务编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4888">public service no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4889">publicserviceno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4889">publicserviceno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4892">rsi no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4892">rsi no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4893">rsi 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4893">rsi number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4894">rsin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4894">rsin</span></span>

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4901">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4901">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4903">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4903">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4904">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4905">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4905">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4906">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4906">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4907">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4907">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4908">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4908">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4909">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4909">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4910">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4910">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4911">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4911">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4912">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4912">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4913">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4914">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4914">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4915">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4916">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4916">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4917">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4917">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4918">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4918">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4919">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4919">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4920">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4920">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4921">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4921">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4922">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4922">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4923">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4923">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4924">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4924">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4925">以色列国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4925">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4926">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4926">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4927">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4927">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4928">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4928">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4929">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4929">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4930">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4931">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4932">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4933">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4933">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4934">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4934">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4935">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4935">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4936">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4936">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4937">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4937">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4938">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4938">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4939">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4939">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4940">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4940">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4941">意大利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4941">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4942">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4942">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4943">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4943">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4944">10个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4944">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4945">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4945">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4946">10个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4946">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4947">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4947">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4948">字母 "A" 或 "V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4948">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4949">七个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字或下划线字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4949">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4950">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4950">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4951">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4952">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4952">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4953">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4954">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4954">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4955">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4955">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4956">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4956">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4957">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4957">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4958">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4958">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4959">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4959">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4960">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4960">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4961">意大利国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4961">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4962">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4962">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4963">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4964">在指定模式中，由16个字符组成的字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4964">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4965">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4966">字母和数字的16个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4966">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4967">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4967">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4968">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4968">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4969">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4969">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4970">一个与出生月份的字母相对应的字母–字母按字母顺序使用，但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，一月为 A，10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4970">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4971">与出生月份的某一天对应的两个数字，为了区分 genders，40已添加到女性的出生日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4971">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4972">与特定于 municipality 的区域代码相对应的四个数字，该用户的出生国家 (国家/地区内的代码用于外国国家) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4972">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4973">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4973">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4974">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4975">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4975">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4976">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4977">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4977">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4978">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4978">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4979">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4979">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-4980">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4980">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4981">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4981">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4982">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4982">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-4983">Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4983">Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4984">codice 会计</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4984">codice fiscal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4985">codice fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4985">codice fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4986">codice id personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4986">codice id personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-4987">codice personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-4987">codice personale</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5016">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5016">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5017">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5017">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5018">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5019">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5019">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5020">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5020">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5021">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5021">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5022">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5022">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5023">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5023">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5024">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5024">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5025">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5025">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5026">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5026">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5027">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5027">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5028">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5028">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5029">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5029">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5041">意大利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5041">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5042">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5042">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5043">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5044">指定模式中的16个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5044">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5045">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5046">16个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5046">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5047">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5047">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5048">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5048">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5049">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5049">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5050">一个与出生月份对应的数字（字母按字母顺序使用），但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，在一月份为 A 和10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5050">one digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5051">两个数字，对应于出生月份中的某一天，其中40将添加到偶数的出生日，以区别于奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5051">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5052">与某人出生的 municipality 特定的区号相对应的四个数字（国家/地区代码用于外国国家/地区）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5052">four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5053">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5053">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5054">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5054">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5055">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5055">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5056">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5056">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5057">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5057">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5058">函数  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5058">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5059">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5059">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5060">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5061">函数  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5061">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5096">意大利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5096">Italy value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5097">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5098">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5098">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5099">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5100">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5100">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5101">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5101">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5102">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5102">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5103">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5103">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5104">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5104">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5105">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5106">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5106">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5107">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5108">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5108">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5109">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5109">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5110">找到 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5110">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5111">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5112">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5112">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5114">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5114">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5115">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5115">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5117">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5117">vat#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5119">iva#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5119">iva#</span></span>


## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5120">日本银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5120">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5121">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5122">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5122">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5123">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5124">银行帐户号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5124">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5125">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5125">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5126">银行帐户分支代码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5126">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5127">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5127">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5128">可选) 的空格或短划线 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5128">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5129">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5129">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5130">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5131">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5132">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5133">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5133">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5134">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5134">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5135">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5135">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5136">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5136">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5137">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5137">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5138">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5138">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5139">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5140">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5140">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5141">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5141">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5199">Otemachi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5199">Otemachi</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5200">日本驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5200">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5201">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5201">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5202">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5202">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5203">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5203">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5204">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5204">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5205">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5205">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5206">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5206">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5207">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5207">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5208">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5208">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5209">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5209">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5210">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5210">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
