## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5238">日本我的号码-公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5238">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5239">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5240">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5240">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5241">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5242">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5242">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5243">一位数从1到9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5243">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5244">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5244">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5245">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5246">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5246">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5247">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5248">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5248">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5249">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5249">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5250">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5250">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5251">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5251">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5252">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5252">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5265">日本我的号码-个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5265">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5266">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5266">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5267">12位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5267">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5268">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5268">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5269">12位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5269">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5270">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5270">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5271">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5271">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5272">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5272">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5273">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5273">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5274">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5274">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5275">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5276">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5277">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5278">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5278">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5279">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5279">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5280">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5280">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5281">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5281">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5282">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5282">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5295">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5295">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5296">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5297">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5297">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5298">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5299">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5299">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5300">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5300">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5301">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5301">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5302">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5302">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5303">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5304">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5304">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5305">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5305">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5313">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5314">12个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5314">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5315">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5316">12个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5316">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5317">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5317">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5318">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5318">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5319">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5319">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5320">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5321">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5321">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5322">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5323">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5324">正则表达式 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5324">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5325">找到 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5325">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5326">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5326">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5327">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5327">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5328">住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5328">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5329">住宅卡编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5329">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5330">住宅卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5330">Residence card #</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5332">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5332">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5333">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5334">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5334">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5335">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5335">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5336">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5336">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5337">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5337">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5338">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5338">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5339">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5339">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5340">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5340">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5341">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5341">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5342">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5342">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5354">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5354">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5356">日本社会保险号 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5356">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5357">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5358">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5358">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5359">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5360">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5360">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5361">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5361">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5362">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5362">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5363">六位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5363">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5364">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5364">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5365">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5365">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5366">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5366">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5367">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5367">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5368">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5368">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5369">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5369">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5370">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5370">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5371">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5371">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5372">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5372">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5373">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5373">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5375">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5375">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5376">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5376">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5377">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5377">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5378">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5378">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5379">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5379">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5380">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5380">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5381">拉脱维亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5381">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5382">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5382">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5383">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5384">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5384">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5385">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5386">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5386">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5387">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5387">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5388">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5388">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5389">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5389">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5390">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5390">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5391">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5391">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5392">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5392">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5393">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5393">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5394">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5394">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5396">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5396">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5400">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5400">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5401">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5401">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5402">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5402">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5406">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5406">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5407">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5407">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5408">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5408">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5410">拉脱维亚国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5410">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5411">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5411">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5412">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5412">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5413">11位数字和指定格式的连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5413">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5414">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5414">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5415">11个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5415">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5416">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5416">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5417">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5417">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5418">一个数字，对应于19世纪的出生世纪 ( "0"，"1" 表示20世纪，"2" 表示21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5418">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5419">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5419">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5420">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5420">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5421">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5421">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5422">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5422">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5423">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5423">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5424">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5424">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5425">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5425">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5426">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5426">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5427">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5427">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5490">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5490">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5491">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5491">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5492">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5492">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5493">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5493">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5494">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5494">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5495">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5495">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5496">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5496">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5497">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5497">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5498">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5498">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5499">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5499">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5500">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5500">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5501">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5502">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5502">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5503">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5503">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5504">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5504">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5505">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5505">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5506">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5506">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5507">拉脱维亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5507">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5508">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5508">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5509">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5509">pase numurs</span></span>    

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5510">拉脱维亚税标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5510">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5511">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5511">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5512">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5512">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5513">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5513">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5514">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5514">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5515">指定模式中的11位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5515">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5516">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (DDMMYY) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5516">six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5517">一个与 "出生世纪" 相对应的数字，其中 "0" 对应于19世纪，"1" 对应于20世纪，"2" 对应于21世纪。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5517">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5518">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5518">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5519">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5520">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5520">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5521">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5522">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5522">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5523">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5523">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5524">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5524">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5525">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5525">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5526">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5526">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5589">立陶宛驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5589">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5590">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5590">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5591">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5592">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5592">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5593">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5594">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5594">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5595">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5596">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5596">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5597">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5598">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5599">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5599">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5600">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5600">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5616">立陶宛国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5616">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5617">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5617">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5618">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5619">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5619">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5620">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5621">11个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5621">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5622">一个与人的性别和出生世纪对应的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5622">one digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5623">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5623">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5624">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5624">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5625">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5625">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5626">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5627">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5627">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5628">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5629">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5629">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5630">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5630">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5631">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5631">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5632">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5632">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5633">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5633">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5668">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5668">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5669">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5669">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5670">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5671">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5671">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5672">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5673">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5673">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5674">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5675">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5675">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5676">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5677">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5678">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5678">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5679">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5679">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5680">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5680">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5681">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5681">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5682">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5682">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5683">lithunian 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5683">lithunian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5684">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5684">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5685">paso numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5685">paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5686">立陶宛税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5686">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5687">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5687">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5688">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5688">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5689">11位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5689">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5690">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5690">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5691">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5691">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5692">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5693">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5693">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5694">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5695">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5695">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5696">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5696">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5697">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5697">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5698">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5698">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5699">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5699">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5733">Luxemburg 驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5733">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5734">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5734">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5735">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5736">6位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5736">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5737">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5738">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5738">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5739">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5740">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5740">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5741">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5742">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5742">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5743">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5743">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5744">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5744">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5745">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5745">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_luxemburg_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5746">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5746">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5747">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5747">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5748">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5748">driver license</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5760">Luxemburg 国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5760">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5761">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5761">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5762">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5763">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5763">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5764">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5765">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5765">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5766">一个与人的性别和出生世纪对应的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5766">one digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5767">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5767">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5768">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5768">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5769">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5769">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5770">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5770">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5771">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5771">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5772">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5772">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5773">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5773">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5774">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5774">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5775">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5775">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5798">Luxemburg 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5798">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5799">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5799">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5800">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5800">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5801">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5801">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5802">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5802">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5803">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5803">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5804">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5805">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5805">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5806">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5807">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5807">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5808">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5808">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5809">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5809">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5816">Luxemburg 税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5816">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5817">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5817">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5818">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5819">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5819">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5820">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5821">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5821">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5822">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5822">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5823">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5823">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5824">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5825">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5825">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5826">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5827">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5827">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5828">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5828">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5829">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5829">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5830">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5830">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5831">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5831">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5871">马来西亚标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5871">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5872">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5873">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5873">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5874">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5875">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5875">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5876">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5876">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5877">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5877">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5878">两个字母的出生位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5878">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5879">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5879">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5880">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5880">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5881">一位数的性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5881">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5882">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5883">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5883">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5884">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5885">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5885">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5886">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5886">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5887">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5887">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5914">马耳他驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5914">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5915">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5915">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5916">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5916">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5917">两个字符与指定模式中的六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5917">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5918">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5918">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5919">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5919">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5920">两个字符 (数字或字母，而不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5920">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5921">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5921">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5922">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5922">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5923">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5923">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5924">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5924">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5925">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5925">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5926">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5926">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5927">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5927">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5928">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5928">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5929">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5929">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5930">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5930">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5936">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5936">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5943">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5943">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5946">马耳他国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5946">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5947">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5947">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5948">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5949">七位数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5949">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5950">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5951">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5951">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5952">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5952">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5953">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5953">one uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5954">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5955">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5955">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5956">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5957">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5957">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5958">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5958">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5959">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5959">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5960">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5960">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5961">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5961">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5962">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5962">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5963">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5963">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5964">公民服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5964">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5965">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5965">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5966">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5966">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
