## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5978">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5978">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5979">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5979">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5980">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5981">七位数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5981">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5982">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5983">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5983">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5984">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5985">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5985">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5986">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5987">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5987">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5988">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5988">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5989">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5989">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5990">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5990">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5991">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5991">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5992">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5992">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5993">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5993">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5994">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5994">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-5995">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5995">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5996">马耳他税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5996">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5997">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5997">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-5998">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-5999">对于马耳他 nationals：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-5999">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6000">七个数字和指定模式中的一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6000">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6001">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6001">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6002">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6002">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6003">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6004">马耳他 nationals：七位数和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6004">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6005">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6005">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6006">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6006">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6007">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6007">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6008">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6008">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6009">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6009">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6010">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6010">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6011">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6011">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6012">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6013">函数  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6013">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6014">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6014">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6015">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6015">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6016">函数  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6016">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6049">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6049">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6050">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6050">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6051">8-9 个数字，包含可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6051">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6052">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6052">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6053">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6053">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6054">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6054">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6055">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6055">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6056">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6056">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6057">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6057">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6058">双三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6058">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6059">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6060">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6060">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6061">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6062">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6062">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6063">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6063">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6064">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6064">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6065">函数 Func_eu_date2 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6065">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6066">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6067">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6067">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_bsn"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6068">Keyword_netherlands_bsn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6068">Keyword_netherlands_bsn</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6069">bsn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6069">bsn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6070">bsn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6070">bsn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6071">burgerservicenummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6071">burgerservicenummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6072">公民服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6072">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6073">人员编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6073">person number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6090">荷兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6090">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6091">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6091">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6092">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6093">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6093">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6094">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6095">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6095">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6096">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6096">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6097">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6097">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6098">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6098">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6099">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6099">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6100">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6100">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6101">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6101">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6119">荷兰国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6119">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6120">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6120">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6121">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6122">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6122">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6123">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6124">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6124">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6125">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6126">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6126">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6127">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6128">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6128">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6129">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6129">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6130">找到了中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6130">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6131">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6131">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6132">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6132">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6156">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6156">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6157">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6157">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6158">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6158">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6159">九个字母或数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6159">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6160">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6160">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6161">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6161">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6162">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6162">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6163">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6163">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6164">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6164">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6165">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6165">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6166">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6166">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6167">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6167">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6177">荷兰税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6177">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6178">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6178">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6179">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6180">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6180">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6181">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6182">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6182">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6183">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6183">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6184">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6184">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6185">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6185">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6186">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6186">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6187">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6187">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6188">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6188">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6189">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6190">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6190">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6228">荷兰增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6228">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6229">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6230">14个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6230">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6231">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6232">14个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6232">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6233">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6233">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6234">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6234">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6235">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6235">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6236">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6236">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6237">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6237">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6238">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6238">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6239">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6239">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6240">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6240">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6241">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6241">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6242">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6242">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6243">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6243">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6244">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6244">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6245">找到 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6245">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6246">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6247">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6247">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6256">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6256">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6257">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6258">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6258">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6259">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6260">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6260">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6261">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6261">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6262">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6262">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6263">三到四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6263">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6264">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6264">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6265">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6265">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6266">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6266">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6267">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6267">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6268">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6268">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6269">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6269">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6270">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6270">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6271">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6271">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6272">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6272">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6273">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6273">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6274">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6274">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6275">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6276">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6276">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6278">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6278">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6284">新西兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6284">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6285">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6286">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6286">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6287">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6288">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6288">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6289">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6289">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6290">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6290">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6291">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6292">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6292">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6293">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6294">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6294">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6295">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6295">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6296">找到 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6296">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6297">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6297">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6298">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6298">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6365">新西兰 inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6365">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6366">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6367">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6367">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6368">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6369">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6369">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6370">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6370">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6371">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6371">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6372">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6372">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6373">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6373">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6374">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6374">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6375">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6376">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6376">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6377">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6377">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6378">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6378">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6379">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6379">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6380">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6380">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6381">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6381">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6382">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6382">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6391">新新西兰的运行状况号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6391">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6392">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6393">三个字母、一个空格 (可选) 和四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6393">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6394">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6395">三个字母 (不区分大小写)  (可选的空格) 四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6395">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6396">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6397">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6397">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6398">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6399">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6400">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6400">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6401">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6401">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6402">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6402">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6404">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6404">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6405">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6405">NHI</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6409">新西兰社会 wlefare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6409">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6410">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6411">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6411">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6412">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6413">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6413">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6414">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6414">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6415">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6415">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6416">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6416">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6417">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6417">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6418">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6418">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6419">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6420">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6420">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6421">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6422">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6422">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6423">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6423">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6424">找到 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6424">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6425">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6425">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6426">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6426">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6427">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6427">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6428">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6428">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6429">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6429">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6430">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6430">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6431">社会 welfare 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6431">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6432">社会 welfare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6432">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6433">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6433">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6434">挪威身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6434">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6436">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6436">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6437">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6438">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6438">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6439">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6439">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6440">三位数的个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6440">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6441">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6441">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6442">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6443">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6443">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6444">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6445">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6445">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6446">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6446">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6447">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6447">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6448">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6448">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6449">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6449">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6450">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6450">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6451">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6453">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6453">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6460">菲律宾统一多用途标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6460">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6461">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6462">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6462">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6463">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6464">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6464">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6465">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6465">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6466">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6466">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6467">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6467">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6468">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6468">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6469">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6469">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6470">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6471">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6472">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6473">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6473">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6474">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6474">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6475">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6475">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6476">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6476">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6477">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6477">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6478">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6478">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6479">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6479">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6480">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6480">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6481">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6481">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6482">波兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6482">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6483">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6484">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6485">14位数，包含2个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6485">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6486">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6487">14位数和2正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6487">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6488">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6488">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6489">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6489">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6490">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6490">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6491">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6491">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6492">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6492">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6493">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6494">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6494">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6495">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6496">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6496">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6497">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6497">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6498">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6498">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6499">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6499">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6500">Keywords_poland_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6500">Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6514">波兰恒等卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6514">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6516">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6516">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6517">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6518">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6518">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6519">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6520">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6520">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6521">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6522">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6523">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6523">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6524">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6524">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6525">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6525">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6526">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6526">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6527">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6527">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6528">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6528">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6529">器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6529">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6530">Nazwa i 器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6530">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6531">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6531">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6532">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6532">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6533">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6533">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6534">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6534">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6535">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6535">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6536">波兰国 ID (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6536">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6537">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6537">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6539">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6539">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6540">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6541">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6541">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6542">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6543">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6543">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6544">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6545">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6545">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6546">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6546">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6547">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6547">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6548">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6548">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6549">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6549">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6550">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6550">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6553">niepowtarzalny 器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6553">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6554">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6554">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6555">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6555">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6556">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6556">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6557">器 identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6557">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6558">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6558">pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6560">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6560">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6561">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6561">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6562">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6562">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6563">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6563">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6564">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6564">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6565">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6565">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6566">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6567">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6567">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6568">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6569">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6570">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6570">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6571">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6571">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6572">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6572">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6573">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6573">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6574">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6574">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6579">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6579">Poland REGON number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6580">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6580">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6581">9个数字或14个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6581">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6582">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6582">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6583">9个数字或14位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6583">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6584">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6584">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6585">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6585">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6586">号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6586">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6587">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6587">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6588">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6588">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6589">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6589">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6590">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6590">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6591">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6591">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6592">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6592">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6593">找到 Keywords_polish_regon_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6593">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6594">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6594">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6595">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6595">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6596">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6596">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6597">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6597">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6598">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6598">regon id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6599">统计数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6599">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6600">统计 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6600">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6601">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6601">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6602">regon 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6602">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6603">regonid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6603">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6604">regonno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6604">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6605">公司 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6605">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6606">companyid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6606">companyid#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6612">波兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6612">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6613">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6613">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6614">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6615">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6615">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6616">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6617">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6617">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6618">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6619">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6619">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6620">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6621">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6621">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6622">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6622">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6623">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6623">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6624">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6624">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6625">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6625">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
