## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6655">葡萄牙公民卡片号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6655">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6656">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6656">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6657">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6657">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6659">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6659">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6660">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6661">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6661">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6662">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6663">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6663">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6664">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6665">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6665">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6666">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6666">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6667">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6667">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6687">葡萄牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6687">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6688">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6688">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6689">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6690">两个字母后跟指定模式中的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6690">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6691">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6692">两个字母后跟七个包含特殊字符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6692">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6693">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6693">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6694">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6694">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6695">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6695">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6696">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6696">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6697">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6697">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6698">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6699">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6699">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6700">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6701">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6701">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6702">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6702">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6703">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6703">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6705">Keywords_portugal_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6705">Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6710">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6710">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6711">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6711">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6714">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6714">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6715">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6715">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6716">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6716">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6717">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6717">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6719">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6719">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6720">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6720">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6721">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6722">一个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6722">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6723">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6724">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6724">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6725">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6725">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6726">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6726">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6727">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6728">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6728">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6729">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6730">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6731">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6731">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6732">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6732">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6733">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6733">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6735">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6735">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6736">葡萄牙语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6736">portuguese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6737">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6737">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6739">葡萄牙税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6739">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6740">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6740">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6741">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6742">9个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6742">nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6743">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6744">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6744">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6745">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6746">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6747">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6748">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6748">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6749">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6749">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6750">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6750">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6751">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6751">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6752">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6752">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6777">罗马尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6777">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6778">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6778">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6779">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6780">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6780">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6781">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6782">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6782">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6783">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6783">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6784">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6784">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6785">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6786">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6786">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6787">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6788">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6788">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6789">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6789">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6790">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6790">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6806">罗马尼亚国家身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6806">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6807">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6807">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6808">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6808">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6809">13位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6809">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6810">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6810">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6811">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6811">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6812">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6813">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6813">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6814">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6815">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6815">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6816">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6816">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6817">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6817">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6818">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6818">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6819">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6819">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Romania national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />

        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6870">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6870">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6871">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6872">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6873">八个或9个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6873">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6874">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6875">8或9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6875">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6876">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6877">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6877">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6878">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6879">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6880">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6880">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6881">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6881">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6888">罗马尼亚税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6888">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6889">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6889">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6890">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6890">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6891">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6891">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6892">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6892">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6893">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6893">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6894">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6894">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6895">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6895">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6896">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6896">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6897">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6897">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6898">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6898">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6899">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6899">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6950">俄罗斯护照号码（国内）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6950">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6951">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6951">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6952">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6952">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6953">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6953">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6954">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6954">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6955">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6955">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6956">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6956">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6957">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6957">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6958">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6958">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6959">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6959">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6960">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6960">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6961">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6961">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6962">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6962">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6963">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6963">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6964">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6964">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6965">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6965">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6982">俄罗斯护照号码（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6982">Russia passport number international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6983">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6984">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6984">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6985">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6986">9位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6986">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6987">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6987">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6988">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6988">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6989">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6989">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6990">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6991">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-6992">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-6993">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6993">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6994">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6994">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-6995">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-6995">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7012">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7012">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7014">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7014">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7015">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7016">10个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7016">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7017">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7017">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7018">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7018">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7019">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7019">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7020">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7020">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7021">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7021">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7022">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7022">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7023">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7023">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7024">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7024">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7027">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7027">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7028">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7028">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7029">新加坡国家注册标识卡片 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7029">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7030">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7030">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7031">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7031">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7032">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7032">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7033">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7033">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7034">字母 "F"、"G"、"S" 或 "T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7034">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7035">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7035">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7036">字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7036">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7037">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7038">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7038">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7039">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7040">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7040">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7041">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7041">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7042">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7042">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7043">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7043">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7044">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7044">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7045">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7045">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7046">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7046">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>

</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7057">斯洛伐克驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7057">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7058">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7058">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7059">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7060">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7060">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7061">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7062">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7062">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7063">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7063">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7064">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7064">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7065">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7066">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7066">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7067">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7068">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7068">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7069">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7069">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7070">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7070">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7086">斯洛伐克国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7086">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7087">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7087">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7088">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7088">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7089">10个数字，包含一个反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7089">ten digits containing one backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7090">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7090">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7091">10个数字，包含一个反斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7091">ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7092">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7093">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7093">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7094">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7095">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7095">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7096">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7096">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7097">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7097">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7098">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7098">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7099">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7099">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7146">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7146">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7147">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7147">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7148">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7148">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7149">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7149">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7150">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7150">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7151">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7151">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7152">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7152">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7153">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7153">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7154">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7154">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7155">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7155">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7156">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7156">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7157">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7157">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7164">斯洛伐克纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7164">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7165">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7165">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7166">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7167">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7167">ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7168">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7169">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7169">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7170">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7171">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7171">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7172">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7173">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7173">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7174">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7174">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7175">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7175">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7222">斯洛文尼亚驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7222">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7223">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7223">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7224">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7225">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7225">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7226">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7227">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7227">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7228">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7229">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7230">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7231">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7231">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7232">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7232">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7233">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7233">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7249">斯洛文尼亚国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7249">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7250">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7250">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7251">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7251">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7252">13位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7252">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7253">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7253">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7254">指定模式中的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7254">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7255">与出生日期 (DDMMLLL) 的七位数，其中 "LLL" 对应于出生年份的后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7255">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7256">与出生区域对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7256">two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7257">三个数字，对应于出生在同一天的人的性别和序列号组合， (000-499 的男和500-999 的插孔) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7257">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7258">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7258">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7259">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7260">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7260">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7261">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7262">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7262">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7263">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7263">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7264">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7264">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7265">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7265">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7266">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7266">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7294">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7294">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7295">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7295">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7296">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7297">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7297">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7298">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7299">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7299">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7300">字母 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7300">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7301">一个大写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7301">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7302">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7302">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7303">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7303">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7304">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7304">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7305">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7305">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7306">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7306">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7307">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7307">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7308">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7308">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7311">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7311">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7313">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7313">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7315">斯洛文尼亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7315">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7316">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7316">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7317">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7317">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7318">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7318">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7319">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7319">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7320">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7320">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7321">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7321">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7322">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7322">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7323">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7324">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7324">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7325">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7325">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7326">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7326">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7327">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7327">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7328">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7328">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7352">南非身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7352">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7353">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7354">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7354">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7355">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7356">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7356">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7357">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7357">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7358">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7358">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7359">一位公民指示器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7359">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7360">数字 "8" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7360">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7361">一个数字，是校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7361">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7362">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7363">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7363">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7364">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7365">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7365">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7366">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7366">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7367">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7367">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7368">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7368">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7369">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7369">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7374">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7374">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7375">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7375">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7376">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7376">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7377">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7377">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7378">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7378">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7379">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7379">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7380">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7380">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7381">由世纪和性别确定的一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7381">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7382">四位数的出生区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7382">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7383">一种用于区分上述号码相同的人员的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7383">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7384">校验位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7384">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7385">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7386">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7386">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7387">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7388">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7388">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7389">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7389">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7390">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7390">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7391">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7391">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7392">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7392">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7393">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7393">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7394">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7394">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7399">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7399">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7400">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7400">RRN</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7402">西班牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7402">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7403">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7403">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7405">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7405">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7406">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7407">8位数，后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7407">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7408">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7408">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7409">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7409">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7410">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7411">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7411">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7412">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7413">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7413">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7414">函数  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7414">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7415">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7415">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7452">西班牙国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7452">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7453">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟国家身份证号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7453">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7454">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7455">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7455">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7456">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7457">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7457">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7458">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7458">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7459">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7459">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7460">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7461">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7461">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7462">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7463">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7464">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7464">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7465">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7465">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7478">nationalid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7478">nationalid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7479">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7479">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7480">nie#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7480">nie#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7481">nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7481">nie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7482">nienúmero#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7482">nienúmero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7483">número de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7483">número de identificación</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7484">número nacional identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7484">número nacional identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7485">个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7485">personal identification number</span></span>
