## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7489">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7489">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7490">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7490">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7491">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7491">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7492">八个或九个字符的字母和数字的组合，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7492">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7493">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7493">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7494">字母和数字的八个或九个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7494">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7495">两位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7495">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7496">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7496">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7497">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7497">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7498">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7498">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7499">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7499">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7500">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7500">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7501">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7502">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7502">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7503">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7503">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7504">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7504">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7505">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7505">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7506">登记卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7506">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7507">西班牙护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7507">spain passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7508">护照书籍</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7508">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7509">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7509">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7510">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7510">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7511">libreta pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7511">libreta pasaporte</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7513">西班牙 pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7513">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7514">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7514">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7515"> (SSN) 的西班牙社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7515">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7516">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7516">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7517">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7517">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7518">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7518">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7519">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7519">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7520">11-12 位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7520">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7521">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7521">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7522">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7522">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7523">七到八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7523">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7524">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7524">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7525">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7525">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7526">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7526">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7527">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7527">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7528">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7528">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7529">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7529">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7530">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7530">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7531">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7531">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7532">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7532">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7533">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7533">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7534">西班牙纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7534">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7535">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7535">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7536">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7537">七个或8个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7537">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7538">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7539">具有西班牙国家标识卡片的西班牙语自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7539">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7540">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7540">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7541">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7541">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7542">不包含西班牙国家的非居民 Spaniards 国家标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7542">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7543">一个大写的字母 "L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7543">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7544">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7544">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7545">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7545">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7546">在没有西班牙国内身份证的14年年龄下的居民 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7546">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7547">一个大写的字母 "K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7547">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7548">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7548">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7549">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7549">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7550">带有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7550">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7551">一个大写的字母，为 "X"、"Y" 或 "Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7551">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7552">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7552">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7553">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7553">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7554">没有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7554">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7555">一个大写字母为 "M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7555">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7556">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7556">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7557">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7557">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7558">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7559">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7559">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7560">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7561">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7561">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7562">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7562">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7563">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7563">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7564">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7564">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7565">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7565">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7581">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7581">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7582">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7582">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7583">免税#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7583">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7596">SQL Server 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7596">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7597">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7598">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7598">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7599">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7600">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7600">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7601">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7601">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7602">字符串 "Password" 或 "pwd"，其中 "pwd" 不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7602">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7603">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7603">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7604">不是美元符号 ($) 的任何字符、百分比符号 (% ) 、大于符号 ( # A0) 、符号 ( @ ) 、引号 ( ") 、分号 (、) 、左大括号 ( [) 或左括号 ( {) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7604">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7605">7-128 个不是分号的字符的任意组合 (; ) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7605">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7606">分号 (; ) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7606">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7607">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7608">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7609">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7610">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7610">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7611">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7611">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7612">找 **不** 到 CEP_GlobalFilter 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7612">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7613">正则表达式 **CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7613">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7614">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7614">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7615">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7615">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7616">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7616">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7617">部分密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7617">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7618">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7618">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7619">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7619">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7620">采用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7620">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7621">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7621">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7622"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7622">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7623">密码或密码后跟0-2 个空格、一个等号 (=) 、0-2 空格和一个星号 ( \* ) --或--------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7623">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7624">密码或密码后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7624">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7625">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7625">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7626">小于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7626">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7627">1-200 个字符的任意组合，这些字符为大写或小写字母、数字、星号 ( \* ) 、连字符 ( ) 、下划线 (_) 或空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7627">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7628">大于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7628">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7629">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7629">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7630"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7630">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7631">尚未</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7631">contoso</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7642">瑞典驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7642">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7643">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7643">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7644">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7645">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7645">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7646">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7647">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7647">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7648">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7648">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7649">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7649">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7650">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7650">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7651">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7651">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7652">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7652">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7653">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7653">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7654">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7655">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7655">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7656">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7656">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7657">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7657">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7658">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7658">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7661">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7661">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7662">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7662">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7663">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7663">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7664">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7664">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7665">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7665">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7666">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7666">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7667">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7667">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7668">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7668">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7669">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7669">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7672">瑞典国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7672">Sweden national ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7673">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7673">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7674">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7675">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7675">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7676">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7677">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7677">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7678">2到4位 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7678">two to four digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7679">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7679">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7680">分隔符 "-" 或 "+" (可选) ，外加</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7680">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7681">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7681">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7682">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7683">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7683">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7684">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7685">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7685">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7686">函数 Func_swedish_national_identifier 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7686">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7687">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7687">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7688">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7688">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7689">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7689">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7690">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7690">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7691">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7691">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7692">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7693">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7693">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7694">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7695">八个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7695">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7696">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7697">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7698">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7699">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7699">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7700">正则表达式 Regex_sweden_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7700">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7701">满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7701">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7702">找到 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7702">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7703">找到 Keyword_sweden_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7703">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7734">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7734">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7735">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7735">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7736">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7737">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7737">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7738">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7739">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7739">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7740">对应于出生日期 (YYYYMMDD) 的8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7740">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7741">与序列号对应的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7741">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7742">序列号中的最后一个数字指示在为 "男" 分配一个奇数号码时的性别，以及一个 "女" 的偶数号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7742">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7743">最多1990，将序列号 corresponded 分配给那些号码的持有者出生或 (的县。如果在 1947) 之前出生，则根据纳税记录在年1月1日的) 使用特殊代码 (通常为9的 immigrants 的1947第七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7743">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7744">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7744">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7745">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7746">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7747">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7748">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7748">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7749">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7749">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7750">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7750">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7751">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7751">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7752">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7752">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7768">瑞典纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7768">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7769">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7769">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7770">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7771">10个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7771">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7772">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7773">10个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7773">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7774">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7774">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7775">加号、减号或反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7775">a plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7776">在以下位置使标识号唯一的三个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7776">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7777">对于在1990之前发出的号码，第七和第八位数字标识出生的县或外部人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7777">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7778">第九个位置中的数字表示为奇数或甚至是女的性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7778">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7779">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7779">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7780">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7781">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7781">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7782">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7783">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7783">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7784">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7784">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7785">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7785">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7786">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7786">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7787">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7787">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7788">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7788">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7789">Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7789">Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7813">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7813">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7814">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7815">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7815">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7816">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7817">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7817">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7818">四个字母的银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7818">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7819">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7819">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7820">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7820">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7821">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7821">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7822">BBAN 的余数 (1 到3个字母或数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7822">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7823">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7824">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7824">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7825">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7826">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7826">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7827">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7827">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7828">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7828">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swiss-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7862">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7862">Swiss SSN AHV number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7863">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7864">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7864">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7865">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7866">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7866">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7867">三位数-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7867">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7868">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7868">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7869">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7869">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7870">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7870">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7871">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7871">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7872">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7872">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7873">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7873">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7874">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7875">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7875">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7876">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7877">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7877">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7878">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7878">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7879">找到 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7879">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7880">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7880">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7881">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7881">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7902">台湾国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7902">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7903">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7904">一个英文)  (，后跟9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7904">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7905">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7906">一个英文字母 (，后跟9个数字) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7906">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7907">一个英文字母 (，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7907">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7908">数字 "1" 或 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7908">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7909">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7909">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7910">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7911">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7911">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7912">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7913">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7913">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7914">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7914">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7915">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7915">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7916">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7916">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7917">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7917">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7918">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7918">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7919">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7919">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7936">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7936">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7937">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7937">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7938">生物识别护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7938">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7939">不带生物的护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7939">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7940">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7940">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7941">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7941">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7942">字符 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7942">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7943">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7943">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7944">不带生物的护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7944">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7945">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7945">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7946">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7947">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7947">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7948">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7949">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7949">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7950">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7950">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7951">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7951">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7952">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7952">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7953">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7953">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7954">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7954">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7955">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7955">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7956">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7956">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7957">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7957">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7958">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7958">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7959">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7959">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7960">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7960">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7961">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7961">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7962">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7962">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7963">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7964">10个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7964">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7965">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7966">10个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7966">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7967">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7967">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7968">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7968">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7969">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7970">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7970">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7971">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7972">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7972">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7973">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7973">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7974">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7974">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7975">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7975">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7976">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7976">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7977">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7977">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7978">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7978">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7979">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7979">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7980">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7980">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7981">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7981">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7982">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7982">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7983">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7983">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7984">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7984">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7985">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7985">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7986">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7986">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7987">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7987">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7988">泰语填充标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7988">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7989">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7989">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7990">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7990">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7991">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7991">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7992">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7992">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7993">第一个数字不是零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7993">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7994">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7994">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7995">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7996">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7996">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-7997">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-7998">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7998">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-7999">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-7999">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8000">找到 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8000">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8001">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8001">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8002">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8002">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8003">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8003">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8004">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8004">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8005">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8005">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8006">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8006">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8007">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8007">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8008">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8008">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8009">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8009">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8010">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8010">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8011">土耳其国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8011">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8012">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8012">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8013">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8013">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8014">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8014">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8015">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8015">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8016">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8017">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8017">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8018">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8018">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8019">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8019">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8020">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8020">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8021">找到 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8021">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8022">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8022">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8023">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8023">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8025">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8025">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8027">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8027">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8029">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8029">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8030">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8030">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8031">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8031">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8032">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8032">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8033">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8033">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8034">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8034">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8035">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8035">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8036">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8036">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8037">5个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8037">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8038">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8038">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8039">日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。出生日期 (第七个字符将增加50如果驱动程序是女，即51到62而不是01到 12) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8039">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8040">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8040">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8041">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8041">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8042">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8042">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8043">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8043">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8044">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8044">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8045">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8045">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8046">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8046">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8047">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8047">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8048">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8048">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8066">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8066">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8067">electoral 卷号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8067">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8068">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8069">两个字母后跟1-4 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8069">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8070">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8071">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后接1-4 个号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8071">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8072">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8073">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8073">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8074">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8075">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8075">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8076">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8076">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8077">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8077">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8084">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8084">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8085">国家/地区运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8085">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8086">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8087">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8087">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8088">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8089">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8089">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8090">3个或10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8090">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8091">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8091">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8092">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8092">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8093">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8093">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8094">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8094">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8095">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8096">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8096">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8097">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8098">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8098">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8099">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8099">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8100">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8100">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8101">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8101">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8102">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8102">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8103">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8103">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8104">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8104">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8106">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8106">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>
