- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8120">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8120">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8121">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8121">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8122">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8122">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8123">国内保险号 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8123">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8124">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8124">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8125">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8126">由空格或短划线分隔的七个字符或九个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8126">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8127">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8127">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8128">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8128">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8129"> (有效 NINOs 的两个字母仅使用此前缀中的特定字符，此格式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8129">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8130">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8130">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8131">"A"、"B"、"C" 或 "d" (类似于前缀，后缀中只允许有某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8131">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8132">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8132">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8133">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8133">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8134">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8134">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8135">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8135">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8136">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8136">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8137">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8137">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8138">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8138">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8139">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8139">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8140">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8140">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8141">要么是 "A"、"B"、"C"，要么 ' d '</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8141">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8142">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8143">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8143">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8144">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8145">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8145">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8146">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8146">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8147">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8147">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8148">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8148">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8149">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8149">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8150">未找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8150">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8172">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8172">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8173">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8173">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8174">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟税识别号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8174">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8175">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8176">唯一纳税人引用 (UTR) ：不带空格和分隔符的10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8176">unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8177">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8178">唯一纳税人引用 (UTR) ：10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8178">unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8179">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8180">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8180">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8181">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8182">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8182">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8183">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8183">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8184">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8184">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8204">美国银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8204">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8205">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8206">8-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8206">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8207">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8207">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8208">8-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8208">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8209">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8209">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8210">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8210">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8211">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8211">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8212">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8212">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8213">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8213">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8214">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8214">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8244">美国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8244">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8245">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8246">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8246">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8247">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8248">取决于状态-例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8248">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8249">与 ddd ddd ddd 相匹配的9个数字的格式将会匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8249">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8250">9个数字（如 ddddddddd）将不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8250">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8251">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8251">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8252">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8252">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8253">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8253">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8254">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8254">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8255">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8255">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8256">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8256">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8257">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8257">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8258">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8258">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8259">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8259">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8260">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8260">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8261">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8261">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8262">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8262">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8358">状态缩写 (例如，"NY" ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8358">state abbreviation (for example, "NY")</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8359">状态名称 (例如，"纽约" ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8359">state name (for example, "New York")</span></span>

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8360">美国单个纳税人标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8360">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8361">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8362">九个数字，以 "9" 开头，并包含 "7" 或 "8" 作为第四个数字，可以选择使用空格或短划线进行格式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8362">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8363">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8363">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8364">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8364">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8365">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8365">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8366">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8366">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8367">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8367">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8368">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8368">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8369">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8369">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8370">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8370">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8371">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8371">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8372">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8372">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8373">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8373">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8374">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8374">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8375">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8375">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8376">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8376">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8377">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8377">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8378">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8378">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8379">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8379">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8380">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8380">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8381">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8381">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8382">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8382">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8383">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8383">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8384">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8384">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8385">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8385">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8386">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8386">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8387">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8387">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8388">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8388">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8389">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8389">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8390">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8390">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8391">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8391">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8392">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8392">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8413"> (SSN) 的美国社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8413">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8414">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8414">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8415">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8415">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8416">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8416">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8417">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8418">四个函数在四种不同的模式中查找 Ssn：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8418">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8419">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8419">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8420">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8420">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8421">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8421">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8422">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8422">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8423">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8424">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8424">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8425">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8426">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8426">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8427">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8427">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8428">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8428">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8429">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8429">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8430">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8430">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8431">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8431">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8432">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8432">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8433">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8433">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8434">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8434">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8435">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8435">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8436">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8436">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8437">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8437">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8438">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8438">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8439">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8439">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8442">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8442">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8443">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8443">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8444">社会保障号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8444">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8445">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8445">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8446">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8446">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8447">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8447">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8448">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8448">SSNS</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8452">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8452">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8453">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8453">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8454">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8454">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8455">护照号敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8455">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8456">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8456">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8457">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8457">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8458">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8458">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8459">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8459">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8460">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8461">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8461">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8462">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8463">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8464">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8464">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8465">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8465">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8486">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8486">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8487">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8487">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8488">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8488">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8489">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8489">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8490">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8490">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8491">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8492">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8492">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8493">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8494">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8495">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8495">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8496">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8496">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8505">乌克兰护照（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8505">Ukraine passport international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8507">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8507">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8508">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8509">八个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8509">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8510">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8510">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8511">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8511">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8512">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8513">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8513">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0de42-8514">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0de42-8515">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8515">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8516">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8516">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0de42-8517">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0de42-8517">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
